name: Synchronize
description:
It’s a platformer where you need to synchronize with the light to protect yourself, stay on the beat to leap over the obstacles, catch the ball to speed up, and reach the end of the level.

Synchronize Team

Producer: Yanyao Hu

Engineer: Jialiang Zhao

Engineer: Chris Jones

Artist: Jingru(Jessy) Tang

Technical Artist: Junyao Li
